translation.en: -[meowing] -♪ No matter what we wear ♪ ♪ We're gonna be right there ♪
translation.zh: ‎无论什么着装 我们都会登场

translation.en: -♪ Jump to it, jump to it ♪ -[Charm Alarms chirping]
translation.zh: ‎迅速到场

translation.en: ♪ So let's suit up And save the day ♪
translation.zh: ‎更换着装 前往帮忙

translation.en: ♪ Gowns and crowns are always fun, And when it's time to get things done ♪
translation.zh:
‎礼服王冠固然漂亮
‎但当我们需要救场

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
translation.zh:
‎公主们就会换上裤装！
‎是的 我们出发吧！

translation.en: -♪ Let's go! ♪ -♪ Glide or sail, or hop a plane ♪
translation.zh:
‎公主们就会换上裤装！
‎是的 我们出发吧！ ‎滑翔 启航 空降
‎用公主的方式 让世界大变样

translation.en: ♪ We'll change the world The Princess way ♪
translation.zh:
‎滑翔 启航 空降
‎用公主的方式 让世界大变样

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
translation.zh: ‎公主身着裤装！耶！

translation.en: ♪ With the Fruitdoms in our hands ♪ ♪ These Princesses wear pants! ♪
translation.zh:
‎我们把水果王国捧在手心上
‎这些公主会身着裤装！

translation.en: [all] Princess Power!
translation.zh: ‎公主力量

translation.en: Okay, Fussy, your "mani-purry" is done.
translation.zh: ‎好了 法茜 你的美爪已经做好了

translation.en: Did you say "purr-fect"? Glad we agree.
translation.zh:
‎你是说“美喵”吗？
‎很高兴我们达成了共识

translation.en: Penny darling, I was just downstairs checking in on, ah, ah!
translation.zh: ‎佩妮 亲爱的 我刚才在楼下看看…

translation.en: Uh, I was gonna clean that up.
translation.zh: ‎我正打算把这里清理干净呢

translation.en: Penny, I'm not asking for perfection,
translation.zh: ‎佩妮 我不是要求你尽善尽美

translation.en: but yes... [chuckles] please do clean that up, and... that.
translation.zh:
‎但是没错
‎请把这里和那里都…清理干净

translation.en: Take the mess and make it less. Consider it done.
translation.zh: ‎收拾烂摊子 少点烂摊子 当然没问题

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢

translation.en: And I've got just the thing.
translation.zh: ‎我正好有个好东西

translation.en: My newest creation is ready!
translation.zh: ‎我的最新发明准备就绪了

translation.en: Behold! The Super-Duper Clutter Picker-Upper!
translation.zh: ‎瞧 超级无敌漂浮杂物收集器

translation.en: This solution will make a bubble that can pick up any mess anywhere any time.
translation.zh:
‎我可以用这个溶液吹出一个泡泡
‎能够随时随地将任何杂物都收集起来

translation.en: It'll revolutionize cleaning all over the Fruitdom!
translation.zh:
‎整个水果王国的清洁
‎将发生突破性的革新

translation.en: It's unstoppable, it's unpoppable!
translation.zh: ‎势不可当 无可匹敌

translation.en: But not Fussy-proof.
translation.zh: ‎但防不住法茜捣乱

translation.en: I guess it's back to the drawing board.
translation.zh: ‎看来我又得从头开始了

translation.en: [gasps] The Charm Alarm!
translation.zh: ‎魅力警报！

translation.en: Kira needs us!
translation.zh: ‎琪拉需要我们

translation.en: -[purrs] -Come on, Fussy!
translation.zh: ‎来吧 法茜

translation.en: ♪ Let's go, let's go Na na na na na na ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们出发吧 呐呐呐呐呐！

translation.en: ♪ When the trouble in our world Feels too big for one alone ♪
translation.zh: ‎当世界陷入麻烦 独自面对过于孤单

translation.en: -♪ Yeah! ♪ -♪ Na na na na na na ♪ -♪ We jump right into action ♪ -♪ That's right! ♪
translation.zh: ‎呐呐呐呐呐 我们说走就走

translation.en: -♪ To help those in need ♪ -♪ Okay! ♪
translation.zh: ‎去伸出援手 好呢

translation.en: ♪ Every mistake we make ♪ -♪ Is just a step along the way ♪ -Whoo-hoo!
translation.zh: ‎失败乃成功之母 无论如何都是进步

translation.en: ♪ So let's go, go, go, Come on let's take on the day ♪
translation.zh:
‎我们出发吧 来吧
‎把美好的一天开启

translation.en: -♪ Let's take on the day ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪ ♪ We'll just try 'til we get it right! ♪
translation.zh:
‎把美好的一天开启！耶！
‎向着成功一直努力

translation.en: ♪ And never give up the fight! ♪
translation.zh: ‎永不言弃

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause that's the Princess way! ♪
translation.zh: ‎因为那就是公主的奥义

translation.en: Princesses, I need your help!
translation.zh: ‎公主们 我需要你们的帮助

translation.en: Mr. Scrumples ran up the fireplace.
translation.zh: ‎皱皱先生跑到了壁炉上面

translation.en: He's too scared to come down and too high for me to reach him!
translation.zh:
‎他太害怕了 不敢下来
‎而他又跑太高了 我够不着

translation.en: A trapped Teenykin?
translation.zh: ‎一个被困住的小家伙？真是糟糕透了

translation.en: That's a huge-ikin disaster! Of course we'll help!
translation.zh: ‎一个被困住的小家伙？真是糟糕透了 ‎我们当然会帮忙

translation.en: We Pinkie Tea Promise to help those in need.
translation.zh: ‎品茶拉钩 伸出援手

translation.en: [all] With our Princess Power, we'll always succeed!
translation.zh: ‎公主力量 成功我有

translation.en: To the Kiwi Fruitdom!
translation.zh: ‎向奇异果水果王国进发

translation.en: [Penny] Wow, that's a big fireplace.
translation.zh: ‎哇哦 好大的壁炉

translation.en: We're supposed to find one little hamster inside?
translation.zh: ‎我们要在里面找一只小仓鼠吗？

translation.en: Challenge accepted.
translation.zh: ‎接受挑战

translation.en: Work with me, pal! I'm trying to get you unstuck!
translation.zh: ‎合作点 伙计 我在帮你摆脱困境呢

translation.en: Ugh, now I'm stuck too! Fireplace: one. Bea: zero.
translation.zh:
‎现在我也被困住了
‎壁炉 一分 贝伊 零分

translation.en: A little help, Princesses?
translation.zh: ‎来帮帮忙吧 公主们？

translation.en: Any chance you've got a rope in that kit?
translation.zh: ‎你会不会刚巧有根绳子？

translation.en: Not yet.
translation.zh: ‎还没有 但在我说“你瞧”之前

translation.en: But I'll fashion up a be-dazzlous one before I can say...
translation.zh: ‎还没有 但在我说“你瞧”之前 ‎就能立刻打造一根酷炫华丽的绳子！

translation.en: Ta-da!
translation.zh: ‎就能立刻打造一根酷炫华丽的绳子！

translation.en: Hold on, Bea!
translation.zh: ‎坚持住 贝伊

translation.en: Nice pull, Rita.
translation.zh: ‎拉得好 莉塔

translation.en: [pants] Thanks. My fashions are fantabulous and functional.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 ‎我的时尚又酷炫又实用

translation.en: I tried, but I think Mr. Scrumples only likes you.
translation.zh:
‎我试过了
‎但我觉得皱皱先生只喜欢你

translation.en: Bee stings!
translation.zh: ‎真是痛心

translation.en: If I were a bird, I'd soar up and carry him out! But I can't.
translation.zh:
‎如果我是只鸟 我就能展翅翱翔
‎把他带出来 但我办不到

translation.en: But my unstoppable, unpoppable bubble can!
translation.zh:
‎但我势不可当
‎无可匹敌的泡泡能够办到

translation.en: Your unpoppable, boppable w-w-what?
translation.zh: ‎你的势不可挡的什么泡？

translation.en: I can send a bubble up the chimney
translation.zh:
‎我可以往烟囱里吹一个泡泡
‎这样就能接住皱皱先生

translation.en: that'll pick up Mr. Scrumples and float him out the top!
translation.zh:
‎我可以往烟囱里吹一个泡泡
‎这样就能接住皱皱先生 ‎他就能从顶上飘出来

translation.en: Then I can catch him when he comes out!
translation.zh: ‎然后等他出来时 我就能抓住他了

translation.en: And I'll bring four extra paws so I can't miss. -Come on, Fussy. -[shrieks]
translation.zh:
‎我会多带四只爪子
‎这样就不会错过了 来吧 法茜

translation.en: This'll be my strongest bubble yet.
translation.zh: ‎这将是我最牢固的泡泡

translation.en: Heads up, Kira! It's comin'!
translation.zh: ‎注意 琪拉 要来啦

translation.en: Let's go to the balcony and see if it works.
translation.zh: ‎我们去阳台看看能不能成功

translation.en: Fussy, do you see Mr. Scrumples? Is he close?
translation.zh:
‎法茜 看到皱皱先生了吗？
‎他快到了吗？

translation.en: [gasps] Fussy!
translation.zh: ‎法茜！

translation.en: Oh. The bubble got you. I'm so glad.
translation.zh: ‎泡泡抓住你了 我太高兴了

translation.en: [gasps] And now it got me!
translation.zh: ‎现在我也被抓住了

translation.en: Princesses, look!
translation.zh: ‎公主们 快看

translation.en: Well, on the plus side, your bubble worked.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你的泡泡成功了

translation.en: Too well!
translation.zh: ‎过分成功了

translation.en: We gotta stop them before they float away!
translation.zh: ‎我得在他们飘走之前拦住他们

translation.en: Or before Fussy pops that bubble!
translation.zh: ‎或赶在法茜戳破泡泡之前

translation.en: To the Pineapple plane!
translation.zh: ‎快去菠萝飞机那里

translation.en: Everything looks so tiny from up here.
translation.zh: ‎从这里看 一切都好渺小

translation.en: It's kinda soothing, don't you think?
translation.zh: ‎还挺心旷神怡的 你觉得吗？

translation.en: Fussy, no! If you pop this bubble, we all fall.
translation.zh:
‎法茜 不要！
‎如果你戳破泡泡 我们都会掉下去的

translation.en: Make a beeline for that bubble!
translation.zh: ‎向泡泡全力进发！

translation.en: Science snag. When we get close, the propeller blows it away!
translation.zh:
‎科学难题
‎当我们靠近时 螺旋桨就会把它吹走

translation.en: Oh, ruffles! It's spinning out of control toward the Pineapple Fruitdom!
translation.zh:
‎可恶！它正在
‎朝着菠萝王国的方向疯狂旋转

translation.en: Don't worry, Fussy. We're safe, I promise.
translation.zh:
‎别担心 法茜
‎我们很安全 我向你保证

translation.en: This is an epic case of bubble trouble!
translation.zh: ‎这真是史诗级的泡泡难题

translation.en: And it's not over! Now the bubble's headed right for that pelican!
translation.zh:
‎而且还没完
‎现在泡沫正朝那只鹈鹕撞去

translation.en: Uh-oh. That pelican can burst our bubble with his beak.
translation.zh: ‎这只鹈鹕也许能戳破我们的泡泡

translation.en: Think, think, think.
translation.zh: ‎快想想

translation.en: If I were a bird, what would shoo me away?
translation.zh:
‎如果我是只鸟
‎什么东西会把我吓走呢？

translation.en: A coyote!
translation.zh: ‎土狼

translation.en: Wait!
translation.zh: ‎等等！

translation.en: You don't want to peck that bubble.
translation.zh: ‎你根本不想啄那个泡泡 你只想啄

translation.en: You want to peck a tantalizing tuna fish tea sandwich.
translation.zh: ‎你根本不想啄那个泡泡 你只想啄 ‎这块诱人的金枪鱼下午茶三明治

translation.en: Phew!
translation.zh: ‎呼

translation.en: [sighs] That was too, too, too close.
translation.zh: ‎真是太险了

translation.en: And interesting.
translation.zh: ‎也很有趣

translation.en: The pelican's added weight made the bubble lower a little.
translation.zh: ‎鹈鹕增加的重量使泡泡下降了

translation.en: So if my calculations are correct, if we add more weight to the bubble,
translation.zh:
‎所以如果我的计算结果是正确的
‎如果我们给泡泡增加更多重量

translation.en: it'll get lower and lower until it lands!
translation.zh: ‎它就会越来越低 直到着陆

translation.en: Science success!
translation.zh: ‎科学胜利

translation.en: Okay! So how do we put things in the bubble if we can't get close to it?
translation.zh:
‎好吧 但不能接近泡泡的话
‎我们该怎么把东西放进去呢？

translation.en: Oh, oh, oh! I know! It's all in the wrist. And the kit.
translation.zh: ‎我知道！只需要手腕和工具包

translation.en: I can fashion up a be-dazzlous slingshot!
translation.zh:
‎我就能立刻打造出
‎一副酷炫华丽的弹弓

translation.en: Sweet! But where do we find stuff to sling?
translation.zh:
‎真可爱
‎但我们去哪里找东西弹过去呢？

translation.en: Check around your feet!
translation.zh: ‎看看你们的脚下

translation.en: [gasps] This thing is loaded with stuff! Here you go, Rita!
translation.zh: ‎这里装满了东西 ‎给你 莉塔

translation.en: True story: you gotta keep stuff around
translation.zh: ‎你得在身边多备点东西

translation.en: 'cause you'll never know when you'll have to Princess on the go.
translation.zh:
‎因为你永远不知道
‎公主何时就得立刻行动起来

translation.en: Okay, for real, those boots look so good on you.
translation.zh: ‎不错 说真的 你穿这双靴子真好看

translation.en: It's working! Oh, but I'm out of stuff to sling!
translation.zh: ‎成功了 ‎但我没有东西可以弹射了

translation.en: Me too! Everything else is bolted down.
translation.zh: ‎我也是 其他东西都拴上了

translation.en: Well, I'm not bolted down.
translation.zh: ‎很好 我可没被拴住

translation.en: Penny, fly over the bubble. I'm going in!
translation.zh: ‎佩妮 飞到泡泡上方 我要进去

translation.en: What? That sounds like the worst idea since socks with sandals!
translation.zh:
‎什么？听起来是自
‎穿袜子配凉鞋以来 最糟糕的主意

translation.en: Are you sure?
translation.zh: ‎你确定吗？

translation.en: You got nothing to show for it if you don’t go for it.
translation.zh:
‎如果你不去争取的话
‎那就什么都得不到

translation.en: Get ready, Bea!
translation.zh: ‎做好准备 贝伊

translation.en: One, two, three.
translation.zh: ‎一 二 三…

translation.en: Go!
translation.zh: ‎来啦！

translation.en: Ugh! Am I late for tea?
translation.zh: ‎我喝茶迟到了吗？

translation.en: -[Fussy meows] -Oops! Sorry, Fussy.
translation.zh: ‎哎呀 抱歉 法茜

translation.en: -[meows] -Teenykin-tastic timing!
translation.zh: ‎真会挑时间

translation.en: Especially since we're so low in the sky. I think we might be landing.
translation.zh:
‎尤其是我们在这么低的空中
‎我想我们可能要着陆了

translation.en: Please return your seats to their full upright position.
translation.zh: ‎请将你们的座椅调至直立位置

translation.en: Gutter ball. I didn't get us low enough to land.
translation.zh:
‎阴沟里翻船
‎我没能把我们弄到够低的地方来着陆

translation.en: But Penny's bedroom is right there!
translation.zh: ‎但佩妮的卧室就在那里

translation.en: And if this bubble was a puzzle piece,
translation.zh: ‎如果这个泡泡是块拼图的话

translation.en: it would fit right inside Penny's bedroom window!
translation.zh:
‎那它应该正好
‎能填进佩妮卧室的窗户里！

translation.en: But we're not floating towards Penny's window.
translation.zh: ‎但我们并没有朝着佩妮的窗户飘过去

translation.en: We will be! Everybody, run with me!
translation.zh: ‎我们会的 ‎大家跟着我一起跑！

translation.en: For real? They're exercising now?
translation.zh: ‎真的吗？他们现在在锻炼身体？

translation.en: No. They're controlling the bubble's direction!
translation.zh: ‎不 他们在控制泡泡的方向

translation.en: It's bubble brilliant!
translation.zh: ‎真是太机智了

translation.en: Brace yourself for impact!
translation.zh: ‎做好准备迎接冲击！

translation.en: Three, two, one!
translation.zh: ‎三 二 一！

translation.en: [Bea] Ricochet bank shot for the win!
translation.zh: ‎擦板球反弹获胜

translation.en: Goal!
translation.zh: ‎球进啦！

translation.en: Game, set, and match, Bea!
translation.zh: ‎比赛结束 贝伊！

translation.en: Now, we can burst that bubble and set you free!
translation.zh:
‎现在我们可以戳破泡泡
‎让你们自由啦

translation.en: Wait! If you touch the bubble, you'll get pulled inside too!
translation.zh:
‎等等！要是你碰到泡泡
‎你也会被拉进去的

translation.en: But nothing's Fussy-proof.
translation.zh: ‎但没有东西是防得住法茜的

translation.en: It's your time to shine, Fussy!
translation.zh: ‎是你大展身手的时候啦 法茜

translation.en: Duck!
translation.zh: ‎躲开！

translation.en: I think you meant "cat."
translation.zh: ‎我猜你的意思是“躲猫猫”

translation.en: Huh. This is new.
translation.zh: ‎这次倒是新鲜

translation.en: I never know what kind of surprise I'll find in here.
translation.zh: ‎永远不知道会在这里发现什么惊喜

translation.en: At least it keeps things interesting.
translation.zh: ‎至少让事情变得有趣起来了

translation.en: Hey, pelican. Boots off the bed.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 鹈鹕 穿着靴子不许上床

translation.en: Need help cleaning up, Penny? I would love some help.
translation.zh:
‎-需要帮忙打扫吗 佩妮？
‎-我很需要来点帮助

translation.en: ♪ No matter what we wear We're gonna be right there ♪
translation.zh: ‎无论什么着装 我们都会登场

translation.en: -♪ Jump to it ♪ -♪ Jump to it ♪
translation.zh: ‎迅速到场

translation.en: ♪ So let's suit up And save the day ♪
translation.zh: ‎更换着装 前往帮忙

translation.en: ♪ Gowns and crowns are always fun, And when it's time to get things done ♪
translation.zh:
‎礼服王冠固然漂亮
‎但当我们需要救场

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
translation.zh:
‎公主们就会换上裤装！
‎是的 我们出发吧！

translation.en: -♪ Let's go! ♪ -♪ Glide or sail, or hop a plane ♪
translation.zh:
‎公主们就会换上裤装！
‎是的 我们出发吧！ ‎滑翔 启航 空降
‎用公主的方式 让世界大变样

translation.en: ♪ We'll change the world The Princess way ♪
translation.zh:
‎滑翔 启航 空降
‎用公主的方式 让世界大变样

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
translation.zh: ‎公主身着裤装！耶！

translation.en: ♪ With the Fruitdoms in our hands ♪ ♪ These Princesses wear pants! ♪
translation.zh:
‎我们把水果王国捧在手心上
‎这些公主会身着裤装！
